force:schema:sobject:describe.description: displays the metadata for a standard or custom object

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

sobjecttype.name: sobjecttype
sobjecttype.description: the API name of the object to describe
the API name of the object to describe

force:schema:sobject:list.description: list all objects of a specified category

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

sobjecttypecategory.name: sobjecttypecategory
sobjecttypecategory.description: the type of objects to list (all|custom|standard)
the type of objects to list (all|custom|standard)
